20110109160014.000|20110109160015.000|CC1|ABSORBS THE HORROR OF A GUN     
20110109160015.000|20110109160015.000|CC1|ATTACK IN BROAD DAYLIGHT ON     
20110109160015.000|20110109160016.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN GABRIELLE         
20110109160016.000|20110109160017.000|CC1|GIFFORDS.                       
20110109160017.000|20110109160019.000|CC1|>> GABRIELLE GIFFORDS WAS GOING 
20110109160019.000|20110109160024.000|CC1|OUT PRACTICING THAT FIRST       
20110109160024.000|20110109160025.000|CC1|AMENDMENT RIGHT THAT SHE HAD,   
20110109160025.000|20110109160026.000|CC1|AND SOME BASTARD SHOT HER DOWN. 
20110109160026.000|20110109160028.000|CC1|>> SIX ARE KILLED BY AN ARIZONA 
20110109160028.000|20110109160029.000|CC1|GUNMAN, AND CONGRESSWOMAN       
20110109160029.000|20110109160029.000|CC1|GIFFORDS IS FIGHTING FOR HER    
20110109160029.000|20110109160033.000|CC1|LIFE.                           
20110109160033.000|20110109160034.000|CC1|12 MORE ARE SHOT AND WOUNDED,   
20110109160034.000|20110109160037.000|CC1|AND THE QUESTIONS HAVE STARTED. 
20110109160037.000|20110109160038.000|CC1|HOW DID THIS HAPPEN, AND WHY DID
20110109160038.000|20110109160039.000|CC1|THIS HAPPEN?                    
20110109160039.000|20110109160042.000|CC1|>> I HOPE THAT ALL AMERICANS ARE
20110109160042.000|20110109160043.000|CC1|SADDENED AND AS SHOCKED AS WE   
20110109160043.000|20110109160045.000|CC1|ARE.                            
20110109160045.000|20110109160046.000|CC1|>> WE HAVE THE LATEST DETAILS ON
20110109160046.000|20110109160048.000|CC1|THE SEARCH FOR THE ALLEGED

20110109160051.000|20110109160054.000|CC1|A SHOCKING CRIME.

20110109160105.000|20110109160106.000|CC1|"TRAGEDY IN TUCSON" STARTS RIGHT
20110109160106.000|20110109160106.000|CC1|NOW.                            
20110109160106.000|20110109161227.000|SEG|Type=Story
20110109160106.000|20110109160107.000|CC1|>>> THIS MORNING, WE COME TO YOU
20110109160107.000|20110109160108.000|CC1|LIVE FROM THE UNIVERSITY MEDICAL
20110109160108.000|20110109160109.000|CC1|CENTER IN TUCSON, ARIZONA.      
20110109160109.000|20110109160111.000|CC1|YESTERDAY IN THIS DESERT TOWN, A
20110109160111.000|20110109160113.000|CC1|GUNMAN OPENED FIRE DURING A MEET
20110109160113.000|20110109160115.000|CC1|AND GREET POLITICAL EVENT AT A  
20110109160115.000|20110109160115.000|CC1|LOCAL SUPERMARKET NOT FAR FROM  
20110109160115.000|20110109160117.000|CC1|HERE.                           
20110109160117.000|20110109160118.000|CC1|SIX PEOPLE ARE DEAD.            
20110109160118.000|20110109160120.000|CC1|AMONG THEM, A FEDERAL JUDGE AND 
20110109160120.000|20110109160124.000|CC1|A 9-YEAR-OLD GIRL.              
20110109160124.000|20110109160125.000|CC1|THE PRIMARY TARGET WAS          
20110109160125.000|20110109160125.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN GABRIELLE         
20110109160125.000|20110109160126.000|CC1|GIFFORDS.                       
20110109160126.000|20110109160128.000|CC1|SHE WAS SHOT IN THE HEAD AND IS 
20110109160128.000|20110109160129.000|CC1|STILL IN CRITICAL CONDITION     
20110109160129.000|20110109160130.000|CC1|AFTER SURGERY IN THE BUILDING   
20110109160130.000|20110109160131.000|CC1|BEHIND ME.                      
20110109160131.000|20110109160133.000|CC1|THE GUNMAN IS IN CUSTODY.       
20110109160133.000|20110109160136.000|CC1|POLICE ARE SEARCHING FOR A      
20110109160136.000|20110109160137.000|CC1|POSSIBLE ACCOMPLICE, AND NOW THE
20110109160137.000|20110109160138.000|CC1|QUESTIONS MOUNT, WHAT TRIGGERED 
20110109160138.000|20110109160141.000|CC1|THIS TRAGEDY IN TUCSON?         
20110109160141.000|20110109160149.000|CC1|[ SIRENS ]                      
20110109160149.000|20110109160150.000|CC1|>> IT STARTED JUST AFTER        
20110109160150.000|20110109160150.000|CC1|10:00 A.M. SATURDAY, TUCSON     
20110109160150.000|20110109160151.000|CC1|TIME.                           
20110109160151.000|20110109160152.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN GIFFORDS HAD BEEN 
20110109160152.000|20110109160152.000|CC1|HOLDING A TOWN MEETING WITH     
20110109160152.000|20110109160153.000|CC1|CONSTITUENTS IN THIS PARKING LOT
20110109160153.000|20110109160156.000|CC1|OF A LOCAL SAFEWAY.             
20110109160156.000|20110109160157.000|CC1|ALEX VILIC, A YOUNG VOLUNTEER,  
20110109160157.000|20110109160158.000|CC1|WAS STANDING ABOUT THREE FEET   
20110109160158.000|20110109160203.000|CC1|AWAY FROM HER.                  
20110109160203.000|20110109160203.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:02:00 of 1:00:00
20110109160203.000|20110109160205.000|CC1|>> KIND OF SHADY LOOKING        
20110109160205.000|20110109160206.000|CC1|GENTLEMAN CAME UP, ASKED IF HE  
20110109160206.000|20110109160208.000|CC1|COULD TALK TO THE CONGRESSWOMAN.
20110109160208.000|20110109160208.000|CC1|AND LIKE EVERYONE,              
20110109160208.000|20110109160209.000|CC1|WE DIRECTED HIM TO THE BACK OF  
20110109160209.000|20110109160210.000|CC1|THE LINE.                       
20110109160210.000|20110109160211.000|CC1|CAME BACK ABOUT 30 SECONDS LATER
20110109160211.000|20110109160212.000|CC1|AND BEFORE I KNEW HE WAS BARGING
20110109160212.000|20110109160212.000|CC1|THROUGH THE TABLES TOWARD THE   
20110109160212.000|20110109160213.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN.                  
20110109160213.000|20110109160217.000|CC1|>> STEVEN RAYLE WAS THERE TOO, A
20110109160217.000|20110109160218.000|CC1|LOCAL DOCTOR.                   
20110109160218.000|20110109160219.000|CC1|HE HAD COME TO MEET GIFFORDS AND
20110109160219.000|20110109160219.000|CC1|SAW A MAN WITH A BLANK          
20110109160219.000|20110109160220.000|CC1|EXPRESSION ON HIS FACE.         
20110109160220.000|20110109160224.000|CC1|>> I LOOKED UP AND SAW A MAN    
20110109160224.000|20110109160231.000|CC1|WITH A GUN SHOOT HER IN THE HEAD
20110109160231.000|20110109160232.000|CC1|AND THEN CONTINUE FIRING        
20110109160232.000|20110109160234.000|CC1|RAPID-FIRE WITH JUST POINT BLANK
20110109160234.000|20110109160236.000|CC1|AT EVERYBODY WHO WAS IN THE     
20110109160236.000|20110109160236.000|CC1|AREA, AND THERE WAS REALLY      
20110109160236.000|20110109160238.000|CC1|NOWHERE TO RUN.                 
20110109160238.000|20110109160239.000|CC1|I LAID ON THE GROUND AS IF I HAD
20110109160239.000|20110109160240.000|CC1|BEEN SHOT IN ORDER TO NOT BE A  
20110109160240.000|20110109160242.000|CC1|TARGET.                         
20110109160242.000|20110109160243.000|CC1|>> RAYLE SAYS THAT WHEN THE     
20110109160243.000|20110109160245.000|CC1|SHOOTING STOPPED, MANY WHO      
20110109160245.000|20110109160246.000|CC1|WEREN'T HURT LEAPT INTO ACTION. 
20110109160246.000|20110109160252.000|CC1|>> THE SHOOTER WAS ACTUALLY     
20110109160252.000|20110109160253.000|CC1|TACKLED BY ONE OF HER AIDES, AND
20110109160253.000|20110109160254.000|CC1|SEVERAL PEOPLE WERE HOLDING HIM 
20110109160254.000|20110109160255.000|CC1|DOWN.                           
20110109160255.000|20110109160256.000|CC1|>> RAYLE, A FORMER ER DOCTOR    
20110109160256.000|20110109160257.000|CC1|STARTED TREATING THE WOUNDED.   
20110109160257.000|20110109160259.000|CC1|>> IT WAS VERY APPARENT THAT AT 
20110109160259.000|20110109160300.000|CC1|LEAST THREE OF THE PEOPLE WERE  
20110109160300.000|20110109160302.000|CC1|MORTALLY WOUNDED RIGHT AWAY.    
20110109160302.000|20110109160303.000|CC1|ONE GUY WAS ON HIS FACE AND     
20110109160303.000|20110109160305.000|CC1|UNRESPONSIVE.                   
20110109160306.000|20110109160306.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:03:00 of 1:00:00
20110109160305.000|20110109160307.000|CC1|>> HE SAW A YOUNG GIRL.         
20110109160307.000|20110109160310.000|CC1|IT TURNS OUT SHE WAS 9-YEAR-OLD 
20110109160310.000|20110109160311.000|CC1|CHRISTINA TAYLOR, WHO HAD COME  
20110109160311.000|20110109160316.000|CC1|TO THE EVENT WITH A NEIGHBOR.   
20110109160316.000|20110109160319.000|CC1|>> SHE WAS UNRESPONSIVE, AND AS 
20110109160319.000|20110109160319.000|CC1|A MEDICAL PERSON, IT DID NOT    
20110109160319.000|20110109160320.000|CC1|LOOK GOOD.                      
20110109160320.000|20110109160321.000|CC1|>> ALSO SHOT AND BLEEDING,      
20110109160321.000|20110109160322.000|CC1|FEDERAL JUDGE JOHN ROLL AND     
20110109160322.000|20110109160324.000|CC1|SEVERAL OF GIFFORDS' AIDES.     
20110109160324.000|20110109160325.000|CC1|DR. RAYLE WENT OVER TO CHECK ON 
20110109160325.000|20110109160327.000|CC1|THE CONGRESSWOMAN.              
20110109160327.000|20110109160333.000|CC1|>> SHE APPEARED TO BE CONSCIOUS.
20110109160333.000|20110109160334.000|CC1|SHE WAS -- A HEAD WOUND         
20110109160334.000|20110109160338.000|CC1|THAT WAS COVER ED IN BLOOD.     
20110109160338.000|20110109160339.000|CC1|ONE OF HER AIDES HAD HER PROPPED
20110109160339.000|20110109160339.000|CC1|UP AGAINST -- WAS HOLDING HIS   
20110109160339.000|20110109160343.000|CC1|ARM AROUND HER, HAD HER PROPPED 
20110109160343.000|20110109160343.000|CC1|UP AGAINST THE WALL OF THE      
20110109160343.000|20110109160344.000|CC1|SAFEWAY AND WAS COMFORTING HER  
20110109160344.000|20110109160345.000|CC1|AND HAD MOST OF HER FACE COVERED
20110109160345.000|20110109160346.000|CC1|WITH THE JACKET.                
20110109160346.000|20110109160347.000|CC1|>> IN THE END, FIVE PEOPLE WERE 
20110109160347.000|20110109160348.000|CC1|PRONOUNCED DEAD AT THE SCENE AS 
20110109160348.000|20110109160349.000|CC1|GIFFORDS AND THE OTHERS WERE    
20110109160349.000|20110109160352.000|CC1|AIR-LIFTED TO THE HOSPITAL.     
20110109160352.000|20110109160354.000|CC1|AS NEWS OF THE SHOOTING SPREAD, 
20110109160354.000|20110109160355.000|CC1|SO DID SPECULATION ABOUT WHAT   
20110109160355.000|20110109160359.000|CC1|MIGHT HAVE PROVOKED THE KILLER. 
20110109160359.000|20110109160404.000|CC1|>> IT FEELS VERY, VERY EERIE,   
20110109160404.000|20110109160407.000|CC1|VERY UNCOMFORTABLE,             
20110109160407.000|20110109160408.000|CC1|VERY UNSETTLING AND RIGHT NOW WE
20110109160408.000|20110109160409.000|CC1|REALLY DON'T KNOW THE FULL      
20110109160409.000|20110109160410.000|CC1|EXTENT OF THIS STORY.           
20110109160410.000|20110109160410.000|CC1|>> LAST YEAR WITH THE           
20110109160410.000|20110109160411.000|CC1|IMMIGRATION AND HEALTH CARE     
20110109160411.000|20110109160412.000|CC1|BATTLES AT A FEVER PITCH IN THIS
20110109160412.000|20110109160412.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:04:00 of 1:00:00
20110109160412.000|20110109160414.000|CC1|STATE, GIFFORDS' OFFICE HAD BEEN
20110109160414.000|20110109160416.000|CC1|VANDALIZED, AND TODAY AS THE    
20110109160416.000|20110109160419.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN'S FATHER RUSHED TO
20110109160419.000|20110109160419.000|CC1|HER BEDSIDE, A REPORTER ASKED   
20110109160419.000|20110109160421.000|CC1|HIM IF HIS DAUGHTER HAD ANY     
20110109160421.000|20110109160422.000|CC1|ENEMIES.                        
20110109160422.000|20110109160423.000|CC1|YES, HE SAID, THE WHOLE TEA     
20110109160423.000|20110109160426.000|CC1|PARTY.                          
20110109160426.000|20110109160428.000|CC1|BUT, IN FACT, THE SUSPECT IN    
20110109160428.000|20110109160430.000|CC1|CUSTODY, 22-YEAR-OLD JARED      
20110109160430.000|20110109160431.000|CC1|LOUGHNER, HAS NO KNOWN TIES TO  
20110109160431.000|20110109160432.000|CC1|THE TEA PARTY OR ANY            
20110109160432.000|20110109160435.000|CC1|CONSERVATIVE GROUP.             
20110109160435.000|20110109160437.000|CC1|AT THE WHITE HOUSE, PRESIDENT   
20110109160437.000|20110109160439.000|CC1|OBAMA HUDDLED WITH HIS ADVISERS 
20110109160439.000|20110109160441.000|CC1|IN THE SITUATION ROOM AS FBI    
20110109160441.000|20110109160444.000|CC1|DIRECTOR ROBERT MUELLER HEADED  
20110109160444.000|20110109160445.000|CC1|TO THE SCENE OF THE CRIME.      
20110109160445.000|20110109160446.000|CC1|THE PRESIDENT WENT TO THE PODIUM
20110109160446.000|20110109160448.000|CC1|TO ADDRESS THE NATION.          
20110109160448.000|20110109160450.000|CC1|>> IT'S NOT SURPRISING THAT     
20110109160450.000|20110109160452.000|CC1|TODAY GABBY WAS DOING WHAT SHE  
20110109160452.000|20110109160453.000|CC1|ALWAYS DOES, LISTENING TO THE   
20110109160453.000|20110109160454.000|CC1|HOPES AND CONCERNS OF HER       
20110109160454.000|20110109160457.000|CC1|NEIGHBORS.                      
20110109160457.000|20110109160459.000|CC1|THAT IS THE ESSENCE OF WHAT OUR 
20110109160459.000|20110109160503.000|CC1|DEMOCRACY IS ALL ABOUT.         
20110109160503.000|20110109160505.000|CC1|THAT IS WHY THIS IS MORE THAN A 
20110109160505.000|20110109160507.000|CC1|TRAGEDY FOR THOSE INVOLVED.     
20110109160507.000|20110109160509.000|CC1|IT IS A TRAGEDY FOR ARIZONA AND 
20110109160509.000|20110109160510.000|CC1|A TRAGEDY FOR OUR ENTIRE        
20110109160510.000|20110109160514.000|CC1|COUNTRY.                        
20110109160514.000|20110109160515.000|CC1|WHAT AMERICANS DO AT TIMES OF   
20110109160515.000|20110109160515.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:05:00 of 1:00:00
20110109160515.000|20110109160516.000|CC1|TRAGEDY IS TO COME TOGETHER AND 
20110109160516.000|20110109160518.000|CC1|SUPPORT EACH OTHER.             
20110109160518.000|20110109160520.000|CC1|>> AT 2:00 P.M. TUCSON TIME,    
20110109160520.000|20110109160522.000|CC1|FOUR HOURS AFTER THE SHOOTING,  
20110109160522.000|20110109160523.000|CC1|THE CONGRESSWOMAN'S SURGEON     
20110109160523.000|20110109160526.000|CC1|EMERGED WITH AN UPDATE.         
20110109160526.000|20110109160527.000|CC1|>> THE CONGRESSWOMAN IS NOT     
20110109160527.000|20110109160529.000|CC1|DECEASED.                       
20110109160529.000|20110109160532.000|CC1|>> CAN YOU TELL US HER CONDITION
20110109160532.000|20110109160532.000|CC1|CURRENTLY?                      
20110109160532.000|20110109160533.000|CC1|>> SHE IS IN CRITICAL CONDITION.
20110109160533.000|20110109160535.000|CC1|>> THE BULLET HAD PASSED        
20110109160535.000|20110109160538.000|CC1|STRAIGHT THROUGH HER BRAIN, BUT 
20110109160538.000|20110109160539.000|CC1|AFTER HOURS OF GRUELING SURGERY,
20110109160539.000|20110109160541.000|CC1|GIFFORDS WAS STILL ALIVE.       
20110109160541.000|20110109160543.000|CC1|>> I'M ABOUT AS OPTIMISTIC AS I 
20110109160543.000|20110109160544.000|CC1|CAN GET IN THIS SITUATION.      
20110109160544.000|20110109160545.000|CC1|>> 6 OF THE OTHER 19 VICTIMS    
20110109160545.000|20110109160546.000|CC1|THERE WAS NO HOPE.              
20110109160546.000|20110109160548.000|CC1|AMONG THEM, 9-YEAR-OLD CHRISTINA
20110109160548.000|20110109160548.000|CC1|TAYLOR, PRONOUNCED DEAD AT THE  
20110109160548.000|20110109160552.000|CC1|HOSPITAL.                       
20110109160552.000|20110109160553.000|CC1|30-YEAR-OLD GABE ZIMMERMAN,     
20110109160553.000|20110109160554.000|CC1|GIFFORDS' DIRECTOR OF COMMUNITY 
20110109160554.000|20110109160556.000|CC1|OUTREACH.                       
20110109160556.000|20110109160600.000|CC1|HE WAS ENGAGED TO BE MARRIED.   
20110109160600.000|20110109160603.000|CC1|AND JUDGE ROLL, THE TUCSON      
20110109160603.000|20110109160604.000|CC1|SHERIFF, CLARENCE DUPNIK, WAS A 
20110109160604.000|20110109160605.000|CC1|FRIEND OF HIS.                  
20110109160605.000|20110109160608.000|CC1|>> THIS MORNING GOT UP LIKE HE  
20110109160608.000|20110109160610.000|CC1|DOES ON EVERY SATURDAY MORNING, 
20110109160610.000|20110109160616.000|CC1|WENT TO MASS BECAUSE HE KNOWS   
20110109160616.000|20110109160617.000|CC1|GABRIELLE VERY WELL, DECIDED TO 
20110109160617.000|20110109160618.000|CC1|COME AROUND THE CORNER AND SAY  
20110109160618.000|20110109160618.000|CC1|HI.                             
20110109160618.000|20110109160618.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:06:00 of 1:00:00
20110109160618.000|20110109160619.000|CC1|UNFORTUNATELY, HE WAS IN THE    
20110109160619.000|20110109160620.000|CC1|WRONG PLACE AT THE WRONG TIME.  
20110109160620.000|20110109160622.000|CC1|>> THE SHERIFF ALSO SAYS THAT   
20110109160622.000|20110109160623.000|CC1|HE'S NOT CONVINCED THE SHOOTER  
20110109160623.000|20110109160626.000|CC1|ACTED ALONE.                    
20110109160626.000|20110109160630.000|CC1|>> WE HAVE AN INDIVIDUAL THAT WE
20110109160630.000|20110109160631.000|CC1|ARE ACTIVELY IN PURSUIT OF, BUT 
20110109160631.000|20110109160632.000|CC1|I CAN'T TELL YOU WHO HE IS AT   
20110109160632.000|20110109160632.000|CC1|THIS POINT.                     
20110109160632.000|20110109160634.000|CC1|>> AND A FEW HOURS LATER,       
20110109160634.000|20110109160635.000|CC1|AUTHORITIES RELEASED A PHOTO OF 
20110109160635.000|20110109160639.000|CC1|THE PERSON THEY SAID THEY WERE  
20110109160639.000|20110109160640.000|CC1|SEEKING, A WHITE MALE, 40 TO 50 
20110109160640.000|20110109160641.000|CC1|YEARS OLD.                      
20110109160641.000|20110109160643.000|CC1|AN INDIVIDUAL POLICE BELIEVE    
20110109160643.000|20110109160645.000|CC1|CAME TO CONGRESSWOMAN GIFFORDS' 
20110109160645.000|20110109160646.000|CC1|TOWN MEETING WITH THE SHOOTER   
20110109160646.000|20110109160648.000|CC1|JARED LOUGHNER.                 
20110109160648.000|20110109160650.000|CC1|IN ARIZONA, THE FLAGS ARE FLYING
20110109160650.000|20110109160652.000|CC1|AT HALF-MAST IN FRONT OF THE    
20110109160652.000|20110109160653.000|CC1|MEDICAL CENTER WHERE THE        
20110109160653.000|20110109160658.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN IS BEING TREATED. 
20110109160658.000|20110109160659.000|CC1|GOVERNOR JAN BREWER'S VOICE

20110109160659.000|20110109160704.000|CC1|ADDRESSED REPORTERS.
